CustomField.description: If Employees are paid a fixed amount of wages (or salary) regardless of the hours worked and the interval varies, this field explains the reason the interval varies. A separate field also specifies the payment amount.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Employees are paid a fixed amount of wages (or salary) regardless of the hours worked and the interval varies, this field explains the reason the interval varies. A separate field also specifies the payment amount.
CustomField.label: Fixed Payment Interval Varies?
